item.title: Empirical Bayes Estimation of Hungrybox's 2017 Character Matchups
item.author: hayden.macdonald.8778@gmail.com (Hayden MacDonald)
item.description: library(dplyr) ## ## Attaching package: 'dplyr' ## The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': ## ## filter, lag ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## intersect, setdiff, setequal, union library(tidyr) library(ggplot2) library(RColorBrewer) library(MASS) ## ## Attaching package: 'MASS' ## The following object is masked from 'package:dplyr': ## ## select Arranging Data Hbox <- read.csv(file = "Hbox2017.csv", sep = ",", header = TRUE) Hbox ## OpponentCharacter Wins Losses Total Win.
